articles.title: GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics

concepts_taught.name: Application of LLMs in theoretical physics
Collaboration between AI models and human researchers

learning_outcomes: Understand how large language models can contribute to theoretical physics research
Recognize the potential for AI to derive new results in complex domains
Appreciate the importance of human-AI collaboration in scientific discovery
strategic_questions: What are the implications of AI models deriving new results in theoretical physics for the scientific community?
How can we ensure the accuracy and validity of results obtained through AI-assisted research?
What are the potential applications of large language models in other areas of scientific research?

learning_outcomes: Understand the concept of real-time coding models
Learn about the importance of context window size in language models
strategic_questions: How will real-time coding models change the way we approach software development?
What are the potential applications of large context window sizes in language models?

articles.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis

learning_outcomes: Understand how GPT-5 can be applied to biotechnology for cost reduction
Learn about the potential of closed-loop experimentation in protein synthesis
Recognize the benefits of autonomous lab automation in biotechnology
strategic_questions: How can large language models like GPT-5 be further leveraged in biotechnology to drive innovation?
What are the potential limitations and challenges of implementing autonomous lab automation in biotechnology?
What are the potential long-term implications of reducing cell-free protein synthesis costs on the biotechnology industry?

articles.title: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT

prerequisites.name: basic understanding of AI security risks

learning_outcomes: Understand the concept of prompt injection and its risks
Learn about AI-driven data exfiltration and its implications
Familiarize with Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
strategic_questions: How can organizations effectively defend against AI-driven security threats?
What are the potential consequences of ignoring prompt injection and data exfiltration risks?

articles.title: Making AI work for everyone, everywhere: our approach to localization

learning_outcomes: Understand the importance of AI localization for global adoption
Learn how to adapt AI models to local languages and cultures
Recognize the role of safety in AI localization
strategic_questions: How can AI localization balance global consistency with local needs?
What are the potential risks and benefits of adapting AI models to local cultures?
How can organizations ensure that AI localization efforts prioritize safety and inclusivity?

articles.title: Beyond rate limits: scaling access to Codex and Sora

prerequisites.name: basic understanding of API access control

learning_outcomes: Understand how to design a scalable access system for AI models
Learn how to combine rate limits, usage tracking, and credits for continuous access
Comprehend the importance of real-time access systems for AI infrastructure
strategic_questions: How can scalable access systems impact the adoption of AI models in industries?
What are the potential security implications of implementing credit-based access systems?
How can real-time access systems be optimized for different AI workloads and use cases?

prerequisites.name: Basic understanding of natural language processing

learning_outcomes: Understand how to leverage GPT for text analysis in social science research
Learn about the potential of open-source toolkits for scaling research
Recognize the importance of qualitative to quantitative data conversion
strategic_questions: How can GABRIEL be applied to various social science research domains?
What are the potential limitations and biases of using GPT for text analysis?
How can researchers ensure the accuracy and validity of quantitative data generated from qualitative sources?
